name: Ring Dips
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a horizontal position with your hands gripping the rings at shoulder width, and your body forming a straight line from head to heels. Engage your core.
2. Lower your body down toward the ground by bending your elbows until they reach about a 90-degree angle or slightly below. Keep your chest up and shoulders relaxed.
3. Slowly press back up to the starting position, extending your arms fully and straightening your elbows. 
4. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions
short_summary: Ring Dips are a strength training exercise that targets the triceps, shoulders, and chest muscles by performing movements with the rings.
